Posts.Content: May 14, 2016 11:33AM Lovemygirbabies wrote: Thank you for the dr. recommendation, I will check them out! Even if I can't see them, perhaps they will know someone that I can see. Chemo/Herceptin are not an option for me, even if I were to wean. I have a comorbid genetic neurological condition that causes me to grow tumors, and one of them caused me respiratory failure for 7+ years prior to removal. I have an enlarged heart and dysautonomia, which causes me other heart related problems.
Posts.Title: Lymph nodes painful on both sides? Lovemygirbabies Lovemygirbabies
